remarks:
Indexed intersection with a universal index class.  When ` A ` doesn't depend on ` x ` , this evaluates to ` A ` by ~ 19.3 and ~ abid2 .  When ` A = x ` , this evaluates to ` (/) ` by ~ intiin and ~ intv . (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2008.) 

---

 Indexed intersection with a universal index class.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2008.)
statement:
viin $p |- |^|_ x e. _V A = { y | A. x y e. A } $.
$d A y $.
$d x y $.
